over 2 minutes.
 Reconstitute the solution as follows: Add 1 mL (i.e., 0.5 mg/mL) salbutamol to 9 mL sodium
chloride 0.9% to make a solution of 50 mcg/mL. Administer 5 mL (250 mcg) of this solution.
 Exclude contra- indications for salbutamol, (e.g. cardiac disease, maternal tachycardia,
hypertension)
